row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
$agentpath=get-location
$snapshotFolder=join-path $agentpath "snapshot\&UC4RB_OUT_TARGET_GUID#" $tempPath=join-path $snapshotFolder "temp" $reportFile="$snapshotFolder\OverviewSnap.xml" write-output "reportFile:$reportFile"
$guid="&UC4RB_OUT_TARGET_GUID#" ### read registry key path from Overview report $serviceName="&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" $currentDateTime=get-date -format "d/MM/%y HH:%m:%s"
$compRepXml='<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <windowsServiceSnapshot date="' + $currentDateTime + '" guid="'+$guid+'" serviceName="'+$serviceName+'" type="svc" >'
$compRepXml=$compRepXml+'<service status="notfound">'
write-output "===snapshot is inconsistent===" $compRepXml=$compRepXml+"</service>" $compRepXml=$compRepXml+"</windowsServiceSnapshot>" $compRepDoc=[xml]$compRepXml $Utf8NoBomEncoding = New-Object System.Text.UTF8Encoding($False) $w = New-Object System.Xml.XmlTextWriter($reportFile, $Utf8NoBomEncoding) $compRepDoc.Save($w) $w.Close()
Remove-Item $tempPath -recurse
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_XSLT_FILE#="OverviewSvcSnapshot.xslt" :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_REPORT_FILE#="&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#\snapshot\&UC4RB_OUT_TARGET_GUID#\OverviewSnap.xml" :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_SNAP_FILE#="snapshot\&UC4RB_OUT_TARGET_GUID#\OverviewSnap.xml"
